extract.user_instructions: Extract information on small molecules for which a melting point or boiling point is reported. Only include data if a valid IUPAC or well-known common name is present. Numeric values must be in Â°C. If a paper reports a range, you may take the midpoint or the approximate average. Exclude polymers, proteins, or large biomolecules unless a well-defined small molecule is given with a parseable name.
